item.title: Utility-Studio
item.description: A single source for text, youtube and link extraction and summarization.
item.content:
A application to perform extraction of information from web, youtube, or document links, download video/audio from youtube links, and summarize the text content.
Tech Stack:
- Refine (React, NextJS) - Appwrite (Functions, Storage) - Typescript - Python (Cloud Functions) - Material UI
